## StringEncoding.windowsCodepage property

The Windows codepage that is the closest mapping to this [StringEncoding](./iconv-corefoundation.stringencoding.md)<!-- -->.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
readonly windowsCodepage: number | null;
```

## Remarks

This is the return value of the Core Foundation function [CFStringConvertEncodingToWindowsCodepage](https://developer.apple.com/documentation/corefoundation/1543125-cfstringconvertencodingtowindows?language=objc)<!-- -->.
